segment.source: You must be connected to the Internet to Log In!
Log in and select Offline Available in the audio project card menu and then log out. Or, click IMPORT AUDIO PROJECT to import an audio project your admin exported.
To create an online audio project for working alone:
Please select row(s) to remove assignment.
{0} {1} are selelected but modifying the permissions will change all {2} {3} with this permission scheme
Expected full Audacity project path name
Return to the team screen, mark the project for offline use and change modes to let the project be downloaded. That will put the media files into a local folder where Audacity can get them.
Audacity is current running. Close before using this function.
Open Audacity and use File:Export before importing
Use File:Import in Audacity to load current audio if desired.
Missing import file: {0}. Please open Audacity again and use File, Export to save the contents and then use Import here.
Missing file. Use Browse to search for it or Create to make a new file.
If you have an existing Audacity project you want to link to this passage, click BROWSE. To create a new Audacity project with an automatically created name, click CREATE.
Bible Id already exists. Please contact support if you need to work on this Bible.
Bible Id must begin with the language code and version (six letters).
Bible Id should begin with the language code.
Enter the name of the organization that will hold the rights for recordings of the converted voices.
User has been given Creator permission.
Information to use when publishing audio created by this team.
Deleting the team will delete all audio projects of the team.
A project must be added before recordings are allowed
Choose the language to auto transcribe. If the language is not available, choose a closely related language with a similar writing system.
Permissions may be set for projects of this team.
New Voice change samples must be created before a recording is waiting to be saved.
Upload or record a statement releasing the rights to publish material recorded by this speaker. A suggested script for the recorded permission is given which can be personalized.
Save or Clear your recording before uploading.
Changing segments will invalidate some recordings since they are linked to the segment start and end.

The recorded permission is used both as a voice sample to change the audio and as a license to use the voice sample in recordings. A suggested script for the recorded permission is given which can be personalized.
Change instructions for this step on the workflow settings for this step.
Delete this discussion and all comments?
Locate discussion subject in audio recording
Save changed discussions and comments first?
Import file will not include latest exported data.
This file was not exported from the latest version. Reexport your PTF file from the online version.
Import File does not contain current audio project.
Current data in audio project {name0} was last exported {date0}.
Current data in audio project {name0} has never been exported to an itf file to preserve changes.
This file was exported with a newer version of the program. You should download the latest version before importing! If you continue, some data may not be imported correctly.
Audio Project {name0} was previously imported with a newer file: {date1}
Not a valid Portable Transcriber File
You are not a member of this audio project team. This audio project will not be accessible after import.
Please verify by clicking on the link in the authorization email sent to your account.
All Passages on all team projects
Copy the query contents and paste it into one or more of the AI chat tools:
The keyword to search on. Currently only searches against content names (not inside content). Non-English names are supported. Must be at least 3 characters in length.
Convert text to audio resource file
Please draft a story to illustrate the meaning of {0}
Please provide an oral translation of {0}
Install the What's App app on your phone and join the group for your language. You can also install What's App on Windows and link to your phone App. Use Meta AI
Drag a column header here to group by that column
Not a valid Incremental Transcriber File (ITF).

If this error occurred while importing offline changes, please close the app immediately and reopen. If the error persists, contact support. If you continue to use the app, you will lose offline changes.
Import File does not contain current audio project.
Please select file to be uploaded.
Changes made since data provided to offline member:
Audio Project {0} has been deleted online.
ITF does not contain current audio project. It contains audio project {0}.
You must satisfy all criteria to sync.
{0} passage(s) have invalid book or reference.
You are not a member of a {lang0} {0} Project.
You're not permitted to sync to Paratext
Are you connected to the Internet?
Do you have permission to edit the {0} project text?
Are you connected to a {lang0} {0} project?
Please click the following link to accept the invitation:
Enter the email address of the person to invite.
Separate multiple email addresses with a semicolon (';').
This team has no audio projects.
Delete translation from {0}? Are you sure?
Find a language by name, code, or country
Log Out and Force Data Reload
Something went wrong. The developers need to address this issue.
Invitation not accepted. You must login with the email that the invitation was sent to.
Unable to load audio project data offline.
You must be online to use this menu item.
Do you want to save before leaving this page?
Your session will expire in {0} seconds. Would you like to continue?
Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
Replace the current rights holder with {0}?
Please select files to be uploaded.
File {0} is too large {1}. File Limit is {2}MB
File {0} is an unsupported file type.
Drag and drop files here, or click here to browse for the files.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file. Formats accepted are .png, .jpg (or .jpeg) and .webp.
Upload a speaker rights release for {0} in audio or visual format. Audio formats accepted are .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg. Visual formats accepted are .pdf, .png, or .jpg.
Upload an Incremental Transcriber File (itf file) exported from the Desktop app.
Upload Change Data from Desktop app.
Enter a URI link for a resource.
Enter text to be used as a resource. (Mark down formatting is allowed.)
Upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format or visual content in .pdf format.
Upload complete Audio Project Data from PTF
Upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format or visual content in .pdf format.
You can upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format.
you want to set up a project with multiple passages
you plan to record each passage as part of the workflow
you have one or a few prerecorded audio files for passages
you just want to try out the program before you set up an actual project
Create a project with one or a few audio files.
Here are optional ways to get started. Later, you can use the Edit Audio Project Settings dialog box to change any of your initial settings.
These controls can be used to find or create (using artificial intelligence -- AI) resources for internalizing the passage, section, chapter, or book.
Pasted data must contain two or three columns. One of them must be the reference.
Unable to parse {0} segment boundaries. {1} segment boundaries were adjusted.
Nothing changed! Perhaps no references matched?
Only the first selected note is used
A Suffix is added to the end of the Reference (if there is no Description to override it).
Steps through connecting chunks of a general resource with {0} and passages.
Unused segment: only segments with References will create resources
General - to be used by multiple {0} or passages. (Uploaded files will only appear under Configure General.)
Set this and all previous steps complete
File is too large. File Limit is {1}MB
Peer Groups allow you to assign tasks to a group rather than an individual.
This group is referenced in {0} {2} steps in {1} {2} schemes
Do you want to remove the peer group and information about who are the members?
Do we need this group? Or just use team admin? People in this group will be able to do any step, even if it is assigned to a group they are not in.
Not sure we need this permission either, because it is unclear what special things consultants do in this software. Independent Consultant's comments will be visible to all team members.
CITs comments will only be visible to Mentors until a mentor approves the comment.
Mentor's comments will only be visible to CITs. Mentors can approve CIT's comments to make them visible to the rest of the team.
General Peer Group with no special permissions. Use to assign discussions to team groups.
Find a language by name, code, or country
If you would like to change the language name enter the new name here.

If you choose to publish, the {0} and the latest version of all passages and notes in all {0} in this movement will be marked as published. If you have previously published and now choose not to publish, the {0} and passages and notes will be marked as not published.

The publishing status of the {0} in the movement will not be changed. If you choose to publish, the movement will be marked as published. If you have previously published and now choose not to publish, the movement will be marked as not published, but if any {0} are published to {1}, the movement will still appear in {1}.

If you choose to publish, the {0} and the latest version of all passages and notes (except linked notes) in this {0} will be marked as published. If you have previously published and now choose not to publish, the passages and notes will be marked as not published.

If you choose to publish, the {0} will be marked as published but the publishing status of the passages and notes in this {0} will not be changed. If you have previously published and now choose not to publish, the {0} will be marked as not published.
You must be a {0} user with access to FOBAI resources and project Editor or Publisher permission to use this feature.
This project contains invalid Books or References and will not sync or publish. (A valid reference would be 3:2-5 or similar.)
Filter must be cleared to enable publishing.
Select a column head and use CTRL-V to append table rows.
Deleting your user will block you from using the program and remove references to your work. Are you sure you want to do this?
The following action cannot be undone:
Install {0} to be able to sync.
Log out and log in with {0} button
Please choose a name other than your email address.
Allow user to create shared content projects.
Frequency of data sync in minutes. 0 to turn off sync.

If the estimated time for download is too long for you, use the 'x' in the upper corner to close this dialog box. Then add a minimum and / or maximum {1} to the filter. The filter icon is {0} (a downward pointing dashed triangle) and is located before the {3} button on the {4} & PASSAGES tab. After setting the {1} filter, choose the filtered option on this dialog box to see how much time will be needed for the filtered {2}.
Download {0}MB of offline audio project files? (It may take {1} to download on a fast Internet connection or {2} on a slow broadband connection.)
Not Published - not visible outside this project
You must have set up a Bible Id and Name in the Team Settings to publish to {0} or {1}.
Beta - visible on the {0} website when using the beta parameter (not available in the app)
Public - visible to everyone using {0} website or app
Internalization Resources for other APM projects
Changes made will affect source and all shared locations.
Do you want to save and discard data with errors?
Link is not a correctly formatted URL
Are you sure you want to add publishing rows?
Invalid number of columns ({0}). Expecting {1} columns.
Once publishing rows are added, there is no automated way to remove them. Publishing projects cannot be made flat projects.
Go the the Home page and sort the projects to set the book codes.
Make a selection in the Book column for each passage without one.
Resources of this type will be available in steps using the Compare tool.
Passage {0}.{1}: {Pt} project does not contain book {2}.
Book was not set for Section {0} Passage {1}
Your {Pt} login has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Your login token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
The audio file has not been downloaded or has been deleted.
You must login with a valid {Pt} login.
Media is missing or has an unaccepted format.
You must be online to use this feature
This feature is not supported yet.
Passage {0}.{1} {2}: Passage must not span chapters.
Reference does not exist in {Pt} chapter, or reference is within a larger verse range.
Please wait for action to finish.

To load or unload dictionaries requires this app to be restarted. Loading dictionaries that have not been loaded before will require this device to have a connection to the Internet. Do you want to restart this desktop app now?
Unable to hide the last step.
One step visible and added to the end of the list.
Step added to the end of the list.
The {SECT} template works for files exported from {0}.

The AI will continue to work on the transcription even if you close this progress box. Click the {0} button to open the progress box on this workflow step to see the results. Use the settings gear on {0} button to see the transcription using a different language.
You have no more tasks to work on!
Language choice is used to suggest word breaks
Transcription updated by {0}. Keep their changes? {1}
This display allows you to review the transcription that is stored.
Exported data is available on the clipboard. Use paste to insert it into another program.
Writing file...It could take up to 6 minutes to resume progress.
You do not have permission to download the project.
Export the full audio project to store locally or share with another offline member. Export incremental file to import changes into online app.
The audio project cannot be exported. The export file is too large.
Plan is incomplete: attach audio to passages.
You have new changes locally that were not included in the PTF export. Please also export an itf file to capture all changes.
WARNING: Since back translation recordings already exist, back translation segments will not be updated to line up with verse changes.
The verse markup has issues. Do you want to continue?
Warning: Verses in passage not included: ({0})
Warning: Some audio segments will not be included in verses
ERROR: Some verses have no segment: ({0})
ERROR: Some verses are outside passage: ({0})
Invalid number of columns on clipboard.
You must be 18 years or older to give consent to use your voice.
Gender must be a single word.
To aid in categorizing my voice for use, {0}.
Since I am being compensated by the team, my voice can be used by the team without additional compensation.
I understand that {0} will only use my voice with languages I do not regularly use, to prevent impersonation. {1}.
The languages that I speak are
but choose not to be identified by name

I {0} provide consent for {1} to record and store this file with my voice in the cloud and possibly in a voice library for publishing and use in AI applications that require a voice sample, including voice conversion. The recording created by {1} of me reading this script will become the exclusive property of {1} which shall have the unlimited right to make, have made, use, copy, display in public, reconstruct, repair, modify, reproduce, publish, distribute and sell the Work Product, in whole or in part, or combine the Work Product with other matter, or not use the Work Product at all, as it sees fit. {1} will use the recording in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, Audio books, narrating apps, and scripture engagement to further the mission of the organization. {2}{3} I have been provided this script in a language I understand, and have been given the option to request this script in a language of my choice. This recording will act as my signature in place of a written agreement. {4} I sign with my voice, {5}.
I understand that my voice can be used by {0} for any or all of its projects on audio files for the vernacular language, navigation language or any back translation languages.
I understand that I will not be compensated for the use of my voice.
Publishing projects cannot be made flat.
Please enter in the format: singular/plural
Book Designation must not be a Scripture book code.
This project contains resources that can be used in other projects for Internalization.
Contact Nathan Payne (nathan_payne at sil.org) for access to create shared content.
Audio Projects cannot be changed to team audio projects later
Supports audio projects that are offline available
Select the Offline Available option on the audio project card menu.
Set up a team audio project

Set up the audio project, dividing work into passages that can be assigned to various transcribers and editors. Transcribers and editors can work online or offline by downloading or importing the audio project.
Work in a team audio project
Audio Project has been set up online
A audio project has been set up online. Transcribers and editors can work online, offline by selecting the Offline Available option on the audio project card menu, or offline by importing it.
AI Service In Progress... This is a remote service that may take a long time if the recording is large, or if there are other requests ahead of yours.
Noise removal failed (More than likely, the server is unavailable).
Choose the language to auto transcribe. If the language is not available, choose a closely related language with a similar writing system.
Enter the full name of the person whose voice will be used to modify the voice or voices in the original recording.
Voice convert failed (More than likely, the server is unavailable).
